content:
Compose a musical piece that follows the chorus of a particular song.
Chorus:  "One step forward and two steps back, 
Can’t find my way and it's just a fact"

Sure! Here's a musical piece that follows the theme and rhythm of your chorus:

---

(Verse 1)  
Waking up to the morning light,  
Chasing dreams that feel out of sight,  
Every path seems a winding road,  
Carrying the weight of a heavy load.

(Pre-Chorus)  
But I'll keep moving, I won't lose track,  
Even when the world tries to hold me back.

(Chorus)  
One step forward and two steps back,  
Can’t find my way and it's just a fact,  
But I'll keep dancing in the rain,  
Every fall teaches me to rise again.

(Verse 2)  
Through the shadows, I'll find my way,  
Searching for the dawn of a brighter day,  
With every heartbeat, I'll stand my ground,  
Listening for a hopeful sound.

(Pre-Chorus)  
'Cause every journey has its own pace,  
And every struggle leaves a trace.

(Chorus)  
One step forward and two steps back,  
Can’t find my way and it's just a fact,  
But I'll keep dancing in the rain,  
Every fall teaches me to rise again.

(Bridge)  
In the silence, I hear a call,  
A whisper telling me to give my all,  
Through the chaos, I see the light,  
Guiding me through the darkest night.

(Chorus)  
One step forward and two steps back,  
Can’t find my way and it's just a fact,  
But I'll keep dancing in the rain,  
Every fall teaches me to rise again.

(Outro)  
So here's to the steps that lead me on,  
To the journey where I belong,  
One step forward, and though I lack,  
I'll find my way, no looking back.

--- 

I hope you enjoy this piece! If you have any specific changes in mind, feel free to let me know!
